kpi.name: M8012C20

kpi_info.title: PDCP SDU data volume on eUu Interface downlink
kpi_info.use: The measurement gives an indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting the total transmitted PDCP SDU-related traffic volume. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU is transmitted towards the UE.

kpi.kpi_alias: PDCP SDU data volume on eUu Interface downlink
